Name: Shimmering Beautifish
Description:
Use to activate the Mount: Shimmering Beautifish.

Alternatively, you may visit the Callista Counter at Meowlux Member Store (2F, Shopping Center near Development Bureau) to exchange it for Meowlux Premium Cards (Bound).
Description2$english: A vehicle fantasy poetically hailed as "the wanderer of earthly realms". Designed as a koi fish, this vehicle fantasy glides over land with liquid grace, immersing riders in the illusion of aquatic flight.​​Rumored to be an omen of good fortune, it brings serendipity in its wake.
